FindTheClanWarriorsStart.text: The time has come for our warriors to come home.

Text.text: But we can not spare anyone at this time. Human, you would be doing us a great
service if you seek them out, and deliver this message for us.

FindTheClanWarriorsReminder.text: Human, please seek out our warriors.

FindTheClanWarriorsFoundWarrior1.text: So the time has come? I will leave immediatly.

FindTheClanWarriorsFoundWarrior2.text: The time for feasting has arrived? EXCELLENT!!!

FindTheClanWarriorsFoundWarrior3.text: Thank you for the message, the shaman's call can not be unanswered.

FindTheClanWarriorsComplete.text: Thank you, human. Here, have three pork chops for the road.

FindTheClanWarriorsAfterQuestShaman.text: You have done us a great service; we will remember this.

FindTheClanWarriorsAfterQuestWarriors1.text: Ha ha! what a marvelous feast that was.

FindTheClanWarriorsAfterQuestWarriors2.text: The feast has ended, and now I am back at my post.

FindTheClanWarriorsAfterQuestWarriors3.text: Thank you again for delivering the message.
